metadataAttributes.Title: Machine Learning Data Lifecycle in Production
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: In the second course of Machine Learning Engineering for Production Specialization, you will build data pipelines by gathering, cleaning, and validating datasets and assessing data quality; implement feature engineering, transformation, and selection with TensorFlow Extended and get the most predictive power out of your data; and establish the data lifecycle by leveraging data lineage and provenance metadata tools and follow data evolution with enterprise data schemas.
metadataAttributes.Skills: ML Metadata,Convolutional Neural Network,TensorFlow Extended (TFX),Data Validation,Data transformation,
